PrecisONTARIO HYDRO NUCLEAR FACILITIES EXCLUSION REGULATIONS (USE OF TOBACCO) which allow the Government of Ontario, through an agreement with the federal government, to administer and enforce provincial labour laws with respect to Ontario Hydro nuclear facilities employees, as of April 1, 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0182 Publication Date: 1998-04-01
